item.title: Cars
item.description: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.
item.cast: Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, Bonnie Hunt

item.title: Citizen Kane
item.description: Powerful newspaper owner Charles Foster Kane was many things to many people, both in life and, as seen in retrospective here, in death.
item.cast: Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten, Dorothy Comingore, Agnes Moorehead

item.title: The Dark Knight
item.description: Batman, Gordon and Harvey Dent are forced to deal with the chaos unleashed by an anarchist mastermind known only as the Joker, as it drives each of them to their limits.
item.cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

item.title: The Maltese Falcon
item.description: Sam Spade, a private detective, gets involved in a murderous hunt for a valuable statuette.
item.cast: Humphrey Bogart, Mary Astor, Peter Lorre

item.title: North by Northwest
item.description: An advertising executive is mistaken for a spy and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.
item.cast: Cary Grant, Eva Marie Saint, James Mason

item.title: Up
item.description: By tying thousands of balloon to his home, 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen sets out to fulfill his lifelong dream to see the wilds of South America.
item.cast: Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger

item.title: Star Wars IV
item.subtitle: A New Hope
item.description: Luke Skywalker leaves his home planet, teams up with other rebels, and tries to save Princess Leia from the evil clutches of Darth Vader.
item.cast: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher

item.title: WALL-E
item.description: In the distant future, a small waste collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.
item.cast: Ben Burtt, Jeff Garlin, Fred Willard, Elissa Knight

item.title: The Shawshank Redemption
item.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
item.cast: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman

item.title: The Blind Side
item.description: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All American football player and first round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.
item.cast: Sandra Bullock, Quinton Aaron, Tim McGraw

item.title: Ghostbusters
item.description: Three unemployed parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.
item.cast: Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis, Rick Moranis

item.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
item.description: An estranged family of former child prodigies reunites when one of their member announces he has a terminal illness.
item.cast: Gene Hackman, Anjelica Huston, Ben Stiller, Gwyneth Paltrow, Luke Wilson, Owen Wilson, Bill Murray

item.title: The Big Lebowski
item.description: "Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.
item.cast: Jeff Bridges, John Goodman, Julianne Moore

item.title: The Princess Bride
item.description: Heroes. Giants. Villains. Wizards. True Love.
item.cast: Cary Elwes, Mandy Patinkin, Andre the Giant, Chris Sarandon

item.title: Travelling Salesman
item.description: An intellectual thriller about four mathematicians hired by the U.S. government to solve the most elusive problem in computer science history -- P vs. NP.
item.cast: Danny Barclay, Matt Lagan, Tyler Seiple, Marc Raymond

item.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
item.description: A couple undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories when their relationship turns sour, but it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.
item.cast: Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet

item.title: Invincible
item.description: Based on the story of Vince Papale, a 30-year-old bartender from South Philadelphia who overcame long odds to play for the NFL's Philadelphia Eagles in 1976.
item.cast: Mark Wahlberg, Greg Kinnear, Elizabeth Banks

item.title: Magnolia
item.description: Things fall down. People look up. And when it rains, it pours.
item.cast: Tom Cruise, Julianne Moore, William H. Macy, Philip Seymour Hoffman

item.title: Gladiator
item.description: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by a corrupt prince, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.
item.cast: Russel Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix

item.title: Heat
item.description: An epic tale of crime and obsession and two men on opposite sides of the law.
item.cast: Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Val Kilmer, Jon Voight
